# unicorn/prefer-negative-index <Badge type="info" text="Style" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="fix" type="info">
<span class="emoji">üõ†Ô∏è</span> An auto-fix is available for this rule.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Prefer negative index over `.length` - index when possible

### Why is this bad?

Conciseness and readability

### Examples

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```js
foo.slice(foo.length - 2, foo.length - 1);
foo.at(foo.length - 1);
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```js
foo.slice(-2, -1);
foo.at(-1);
```
